thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to May 31

author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to May 31

organizations.name: world bank - singapore infrastructure finance summit
singapore minister for finance heng swee keat
general news u.s. federal reserve today

text:
April 5 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Emerging Markets Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News
U.S. Federal Reserve
Today in Washington - This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events - THURSDAY, APRIL 5
** MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting.
SINGAPORE – Singapore hosts the ASEAN finance ministers and central bank governors’ meetings – (to April 6). SINGAPORE - Singapore Minister for Finance Heng Swee Keat gives a keynote speech at the World Bank - Singapore Infrastructure Finance Summit. SINGAPORE - 22nd ASEAN Finance Ministers’ Meeting (to April 6).
FRIDAY, APRIL 6 SINGAPORE - Singapore Minister for Finance Heng Swee Keat delivers opening remarks at the ASEAN Finance Ministers meeting - 0130 GMT. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its March 2018 monetary policy meeting - 0700 GMT.
TUESDAY, APRIL 10 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to April 11). BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 11 BUCHAREST - National Bank of Romania holds minutes of the April 4 Board meeting on monetary policy issues. WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds Monetary Policy Meeting. PERTH - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the Australia-Israel Chamber of Commerce (WA), Perth - 0505 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its March 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 12 ** KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting.
** KIEV - The governor of the National Bank of Ukraine Yakiv Smoliy holds a press conference – 1100 GMT. LIMA – Central bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds a monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement.
FRIDAY, APRIL 13 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Financial Stability Review – 0130 GMT.
TUESDAY, MAY 15 ** WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to May 16).
MONDAY, APRIL 16 KAMPALA - Bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision. JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina holds press conference on monetary policy report.
TUESDAY, APRIL 17 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0130 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 18 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to April 19).
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (no interest rate announcement). ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meets to announce interest rates.
CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, APRIL 27 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland release the minutes of its monitory policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
TUESDAY, MAY 1 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting - 0430 GMT. WEDNESDAY, MAY 2 ** SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to May 3).
THURSDAY, MAY 3 ** PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds Monetary Policy Meeting. Statement and presentation will be published.
FRIDAY, MAY 4 ** SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia issues statement on Monetary Policy – 0030 GMT.
TUESDAY, MAY 8 SYDNEY - Speech by Matthew Boge, RBA Deputy Head, International Department – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MAY 9 ** ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. ** BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its April 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, MAY 10 ** BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision.
FRIDAY, MAY 11 ** PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its May 2018 Monetary Policy Meeting.
TUESDAY, MAY 15 ** WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to May 16).
** BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting (to May 16). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0130 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MAY 16 ** BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, MAY 17 ** MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. ** CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting. WEDNESDAY, May 18 ** SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting. TUESDAY, MAY 22 ** BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, MAY 24 ** KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting. ** KIEV - The Governor of the National Bank of Ukraine Yakiv Smoliy holds a press conference – 1100 GMT.
MONDAY, MAY 28 ** JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. TUESDAY, MAY 29 ** WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (No interest rate announcement).
THURSDAY, MAY 31 ** MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
